---
[agent]
name = "full_test_agent"
model = "openai:gpt-5"
retries = 3
instructions = "Be strict and precise."

[agent.settings]
temperature = 0
max_tokens = 500

[agent.input_type]
user_input = { type = "str", description = "User's input" }
context = { type = "str", optional = true }

[agent.output_type]
name = "FullOutput"
description = "Full output with all field types"

[agent.output_type.reasoning]
type = "str"
max_length = 500
description = "Step-by-step reasoning"

[agent.output_type.is_valid]
description = "Whether the input is valid"

[agent.output_type.score]
type = "int"
enum = [1, 2, 3, 4, 5]
description = "Score from 1-5"

[agent.output_type.confidence]
type = "float"
ge = 0.0
le = 1.0
description = "Confidence between 0 and 1"

[agent.output_type.tags]
type = "list[str]"
optional = true
description = "Optional tags"
---
Evaluate the following input:

User: {user_input}
Context: {context}

Provide reasoning, validity check, score, and confidence.
